Description:
The Supertank color MFP for high-volume printing up to 13" x 19".
Built for productivity, the WorkForce ST-C8000 Supertank color MFP includes enough ink to print up to 19,500 pages black/14,800 color1. And, you save on printing — up to 60 percent lower total printing costs vs. color laser2. That’s about 2 cents per color ISO page with replacement ink3. PrecisionCore Heat-Free Technology™ delivers a fast first page out and high-volume, print-shop-quality output. This Supertank MFP with Epson® DURABrite® pigment-based ink produces vibrant prints up to 13" x 19" and scans up to 11" x 17". Plus, there’s zero cartridge waste and it offers the lowest energy consumption in its class4. A powerful Supertank designed to help you do more, the ST-C8000 is backed by a 2-year limited warranty.

    2 years of ink guaranteed5 — includes enough ink to print up to 19,500 pages black/14,800 color1
    Up to 60 percent lower total printing costs vs. color laser2 — plus very low cost per page with about 2 cents per color ISO page3 with replacement ink
    Do more — print up to 13" x 19"; copy and scan up to 11" x 17"; up to 25 ISO ppm black and color print speedƚ
    Product protection you can count on — standard 2-year limited warranty, plus key security features; WPA2 for both wireless and Wi-Fi Direct®6
    Powered by PrecisionCore Heat-Free Technology — delivers a fast first page out and the lowest energy consumption in is class4
    Less waste — zero-cartridge waste with high-yield ink bottles
    Load paper less often — 500-sheet paper capacity; two front trays plus a rear feed for specialty paper
    High productivity — auto 2-sided print/copy/scan/fax; 4.3" color touchscreen for easy setup and navigation; hands-free voice-activated printing7
    Print-shop quality — Epson DURABrite Inks are pigment-based for crisp, vibrant prints in black-and-white and color; borderless prints up to 11" x 17"
    Ultimate wireless and networking — easy iPad®, iPhone®, Android™ tablet and smartphone printing8; includes Wi-Fi Direct6 and Ethernet

Eco Features

    Lowest energy consumption in its class4
    ENERGY STAR® qualified
    RoHS compliant
    Recyclable product9
    Epson America, Inc. is a SmartWay® Transport Partner10

Better Products for a Better Future™
For more information on Epson's environmental programs, go to eco.epson.com
Label: Impresora Epson WorkForce ST-8000
